'hidden' : '']") .popup__content h3.popup__title Want to become an expert? Fill out the application form form#form-modal(name="modal" @submit.prevent="onSubmit()" action="/" methods="post") .fieldset(:class="{'has-error': !nameValid}") v-input(v-model="name", :label="formFirstName" :isValid="nameValid" :type="'text'", :name="'name'" @keyup="nameValid = true" @click="nameValid = true" @mouseover="nameValid = true") .fieldset(:class="{'has-error': !emailValid}") v-input(v-model="email", :label="formEmail" :isValid="emailValid" :type="'email'", :name="'email'" @keyup="emailValid = true" @click="emailValid = true" @mouseover="emailValid = true") .fieldset(:class="{'has-error': !messageValid}") v-textarea(:maxHeight="70" v-model="message" :label="formMessage" :isValid="messageValid" :name="'message'" @value="checkMessage" @keyup="messageValid = true" @click="messageValid = true" @mouseover="messageValid = true") button(type="submit" name="submit") span Send
